comment: His sacasim is off the charts. Definitely be careful how you word your questions.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: This majestic creature has descended from the knowledge gods of above and is ready to make you learn! He will happily take what's written on a whiteboard and stuff it into your minds! He also has his own jingle for when the need for a Math Q&A arises (Like a good neighbor, Crawford is there!)

Professor Crawford is in a way two faced. I read the previous reviews and decided to give him a try but after sometime he got tougher and more frustrated if we didn't understand the material. It eventually got to the point that I had to quit the class. Don't be Deceived

This guy definitely knows what he is talking about. I can talk to him like he is a friend instead of a professor as if he were my age or younger. He should probably get paid more than he is. I would recommend him to anyone who is taking Calc 1 soon.
